verses.roman:
paramānanda-purī tāhāṅ rahe catur-māsa
śuni' mahāprabhu gelā purī-gosāñira pāśa

synonyms: paramānanda-purī—Paramānanda Purī; tāhāṅ—there; rahe—remained; catur-māsa—four months; śuni'-hearing; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gelā—went; purī—Paramānanda Purī; gosāñira—the spiritual master; pāśa—near.
translation: Paramānanda Purī was staying at Ṛṣabha Hill during the four months of the rainy season, and when Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu heard this, He immediately went to see him.
